channel.title: Another tech blog
channel.description: Recent content on Another tech blog

item.title: Private DNS with Synology and Tailscale
item.description: This article explains how to switch from static IPs + ports for your services to FQDN with HTTPS in Synology.

item.title: Setup Neovim for Elixir
item.description: I have been using Vim/Neovim as my primary IDE for the last 5 years and developing in Elixir for the past 2 years and a half or so. In this article, I’ll try to explain my current setup with its plugin and global configuration. I’ll also include as many tips as possible so that you can boost your productivity using this fantastic editor.
